mapper.update: update t_customer_order set cus_id = #{cusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cus_id, order_no, order_date, address, state, create_date, update_date, is_valid from t_customer_order where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, cus_id, order_no, order_date, address, state, create_date, update_date, is_valid from t_customer_order
